channel.title: How i make 2 world in my server?
channel.description:
how i make 2 world in my server?i use deltascape server
some 1 have ideas?

item.title: How i make 2 world in my server?
item.dc:creator: @smkscape smkscape
item.description:
@smkscape wrote:

If you mean you want to run 2 servers, but they have to load on same accounts. Then just use 2 diffrent ports. But make the accounts load not from ./characters/ but from C:/characters/. Then make a folder called characters in your C:. You also have to change all the methodes of safing and loading from ./characters to C:/characters/.

Read full topic
item.source: How i make 2 world in my server?

item.title: How i make 2 world in my server?
item.dc:creator: @The_Chubby_Bunny The Chubby Bunny
item.description:
@The_Chubby_Bunny wrote:

portforward for 2 different ports. For example, if one server listens on 43594, you would go to the second server, find server.java, and search for

serverlistenerport

and change the number to 43595, or something other than 43594
providing that you have a 317

Read full topic
